page.title: 04GAMES-PLAY-TEAMS-CONTINUED
page.content: Murder in the dark__One person has to guess who is the murderer in a circle.He winks at people to kill them.Guesser must watch carefully. Dead Lions__See who can lie still the longest. Hide and Seek__Everyone hides,then one person tries to find them. T.V.Games__these are electronic games which come with their own screen,or can be used with a television screen.They can be traditional games like football,squash etc or newer games like Donkey Kong which is a chasing and catching game using computer graphics.
